title: Bad Girls Don't Marry Marines
description: [New Adult Fiction (Ages 18-25)]Valerie Willis has done it tattoos, one-night stands, even strip poker. And now she can add getting a messy public divorce to that list. Back in her hometown of Rock Canyon, Val just wants to wait for the scandal to pass. But when she suddenly finds herself face-to-face with former flame Justin Silverton, hiding from her heart -- and the sexy Marine -- won't be that simple. It's been ten years since Justin kissed Val, but he still remembers the way they just seemed to -- fit. So when a twist of fate brings him the chance to chase her across state lines and spend a weekend winning her heart, Justin is all in. Because when he sees something he wants, he fights for it.
author: Codi Gary
